name: ROGALIK
detailed_description:
The return of the famous platformer in a new version.
Play the continuation of the project and evaluate new opportunities.
In the near future, a global expansion of the game levels

ROGALIK - This is a two-dimensional platformer, whose actions take place in Ancient Greece, stylized with pixel graphics. You have to play for a warrior that, with a sword and shield, fights against various opponents and passes numerous obstacles. You will face various difficulties and dangers and your goal is to overcome them.

Features
- Different enemies and their behavior
- Dangerous traps
- Unique 2D design
- Good soundtrack
- Enemies

short_description: Famous 2D pixel platformer in a new guise

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 mb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
